data.name: Dr.Pumpkin
data.detailed_description:
Helllo adventure,
You had crashed landed into an island called "Jamba Obobea" near a village. They had saved your live. You had with spent them a few days but someone did an experiment to take over the entire WORLD. It was a success he tested it on his self and he became Dr.Pumpkin if he catches you he can make more walking pumpkins

Have FUN >:D

The Goal:
Your goal is to find the key as posable before Mr.Pumpkin man gets more walking pumpkins chasing you.

JOIN THE DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/MMrKsAQJaN

Features
- A walking pumpkin
- Limited set of clues to travel the island
- Access to the full game
- Have a Walking Pumpkin man that will be chasing you around
- New and free DLCs every month
- Suggestions are open!
Email me
- Low Storage space needed!
- Full Support and chatting Discord server
- Tutorials
- English Only game (English is the only language in this game)

data.short_description: A Pumpkin is hunting your dreams save the people from the pumpkin? Can you escape your self and save the entire island? SPOILER: You will not!
data.reviews:
“Great game the dev is really friendly it was worth spending 12$ on the EPIC game. Also the Staff team at Dr.Pumpkin always add new levels and they are always open for suggestions!”
10 – Pigger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Windows 8 or 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or above / RYZEN 5 2600
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 BIT Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or above / RYZEN 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 2060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 8
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 814 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel i7/i9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 850 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
